verses.text: Hear \w my|strong="H1732"\w* voice, God, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* complaint. Preserve \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life from fear \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* enemy.

Hide \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* conspiracy \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* wicked, \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* noisy crowd \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ones doing evil;
\w who|strong="H7489"\w* sharpen \w their|strong="H5641"\w* tongue like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H6466"\w* aim \w their|strong="H5641"\w* arrows, deadly words,

\w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w shoot|strong="H1869"\w* innocent men \w from|strong="H1697"\w* ambushes. \w They|strong="H1697"\w* \w shoot|strong="H1869"\w* at \w him|strong="H1697"\w* suddenly \w and|strong="H2719"\w* fearlessly.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* encourage themselves \w in|strong="H3808"\w* evil plans. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* talk about laying snares \w secretly|strong="H4565"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* say, “\w Who|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* see \w them|strong="H3384"\w*?”

\w They|strong="H1697"\w* \w plot|strong="H1697"\w* injustice, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w We|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w made|strong="H2388"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* perfect \w plan|strong="H1697"\w*!” \w Surely|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w*’s mind \w and|strong="H2388"\w* heart \w are|strong="H1697"\w* cunning.

\w But|strong="H3820"\w* \w God|strong="H2664"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* shoot at \w them|strong="H7130"\w*. \w They|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* suddenly struck down \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w an|strong="H8552"\w* arrow.

\w Their|strong="H1961"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* tongues shall ruin \w them|strong="H1961"\w*. All who see \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* shake \w their|strong="H1961"\w* heads.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* mankind \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* \w be|strong="H3956"\w* afraid. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* declare \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H5921"\w* God, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3956"\w* wisely ponder \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* \w be|strong="H3372"\w* glad \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3372"\w* \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* take refuge \w in|strong="H7919"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* upright \w in|strong="H7919"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H7919"\w* praise \w him|strong="H5046"\w*!
